title: Sadu da Ƙungiyar
subtitle: Ƙungiyar Seemorg Foundation ta ƙunshi injiniyoyi, masu bincike, da ƴan zane waɗanda ke da sha'awa wajen gina binciken addinin Musulunci na zamani. Manufarmu ita ce samar da babban ratar ilimi tsakanin ilimin gargajiya da fasahar zamani, ta yadda dukiyar al'adun adabin Musulunci za ta kasance a hannu ga duk duniya.
board-subtitle: Kwamitin Seemorg Foundation ya ƙunshi manyan ƙwararru a cikin bincike da fasaha, kowannensu yana da shekaru na gogewa a fagen da suka dace. A tare, suna kula da ƙungiyar kuma suna tabbatar da cewa tana ci gaba da manufarta na cire ilimin Musulunci.

abdellatif-abdelfattah.name: Abdellatif Abdelfattah
abdellatif-abdelfattah.description: Abdellatif ya kafa Tarteel AI tare, ya jagoranci injiniya a Quran.com, kuma ya yi aiki a Twitter.

mohamed-lamine.name: Mohamed Lamine
mohamed-lamine.description: Mohamed ya kasance jagoran zane a Thmanyah, yana ba da shawara ga farawa don ƙirƙirar samfura daga 0 zuwa 1.

ahmed-riad.name: Ahmed Riad
ahmed-riad.description: Ahmed ya kafa Remail AI, Betterbook, kuma ya kasance injiniya a Quran.com.

ryad-ramo.name: Ryad Ramo
ryad-ramo.description: Ryad manazarta ne wanda ya ƙware a fannin ilimin Musulunci da tarihin Musulunci. Yana da digiri na farko a fannin Nazarin Musulunci kuma shi ne wanda ya kafa Gems of Al-Andalus.

rahma-fateen.name: Rahma Fateen
rahma-fateen.description: Rahma ta jagoranci aikin lokalisar da harshen larabci a Tarteel AI. Ta kasance mai fassara a Human Rights Watch.

ahmed-khan.name: Ahmed Khan
ahmed-khan.description: Ahmed dalibi ne a Kwalejin Zaytuna. Shi ne mahalicci podcast na The Creative Minority.

ahmed-aktan.name: Ahmet Aktan
ahmed-aktan.description: Ahmed yana da PhD daga jami'ar Al-Azhar. Yana jagorantar tawagar digitization da ayyuka.

adnan-zulfiqar.name: Adnan Zulfiqar
adnan-zulfiqar.description: Adnan ya ƙware a Shari'ar Musulunci da laifuffuka. Ya rubuta dokokin laifi ga Maldives da Somalia.

intisar-rabb.name: Intisar Rabb
intisar-rabb.description: Intisar malama ce a fannin Shari'a a Harvard. Ita ce shugabar SHARIAsource da Tsarin Shari'ar Musulunci.

zeki-mokhtarzada.name: Zeki Mokhtarzada
zeki-mokhtarzada.description: Zeki ɗan kasuwa ne mai ƙwarewa a fannin fasaha sosai. Ya kafa Freewebs da Truebill tare da wasu.
